title: Lamb and lentil slow cooker curry
ingredients: ['500g diced lamb', '1 tin Heinz Lentil Soup', '2 large onions, peeled and sliced', '2-3 tablespoons medium madras curry powder (or use your favourite)', 'seasoning', '120ml water', '1/2 teaspoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/2 teaspoon coriander', '3 potatoes peeled and cut into chunks', 'a little oil for frying']
